AVSEC Circular No. 10/2010                                                                   
 
 
Subject : Certification of AVSEC Screeners 
 
 
In order to clear back log of certification of screeners, it has been 
decided that the certification of screeners will be carried out by the Board of 
Officers as under: 
 
i)   Dy. Commissioner/Asstt.Commissioner of Security (CA)         -   Chairman 
 
ii)  One trained instructor not below the rank of Asstt.Manager       -   Member 
     Associate Manager/Asstt.Commandant from Indian Air /Carriers/ 
     Airport Operators/CISF.  
     
 
2.       The above Board of officers will conduct test and certification of 
screeners as per the Monthly Programme drawn up by BCAS HQ depending 
on the numbers of candidates required to be certified. The Certified 
Screener, detailed in the Board of officers for the certification, will not be 
associated with the certification programme for his/her own Airlines/ Airport / 
Department. This Board of officers shall submit the result to BCAS HQ 
training division immediately after such test for publication of the result. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of security (CA) 
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
